description: Surrogate primary key uniquely identifying this record linking a fleet unit to a schedule set.
System-generated audit datetime for record creation or last update (format YYYYMMDDHHMMSSmmm); likely set by the integration layer; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the fleet unit assigned; foreign key to the asset/equipment master.
Reference metadata indicating the target entity/table for the equipment foreign key; used by application or integration logic; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the schedule grouping or dispatch set to which the unit is assigned; foreign key to scheduling configuration.
Reference metadata indicating the target entity/table for the schedule set foreign key; used by application or integration logic; confirm with SME.
Original identifier from a prior system to support lineage and migration traceability; may be blank if not migrated.
Original source table or entity name from a prior system for lineage and migration traceability; may be blank if not migrated.
Boolean flag indicating the record was modified since the last synchronization or load; confirm exact trigger logic with SME.
Boolean soft-delete indicator showing the record is slated for removal and should be excluded from active processing.
